newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Platinum Tech estimates up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Platinum Tech estimates up.

text.p: -- Hanifen Imhoff Inc on Monday said it revised its 1997 and 1998 earnings estimates for Platinum Technology Inc in light of a new bottom-line focus at the comnpany.
-- Hanifen said it raised its 1997 earnings estimate to $0.49 a share from $0.45, and its 1998 estimate to $0.94 from $0.90.

-- Platinum, which develops database-management software tools, is moving out of its "investment phase," and with its shares trading at slightly more than one times fiscal 1997 sales, the downside risk is minimal, Hanifen said.
-- Platinum is also likely to re-establish its credibility with investors if it can deliver earnings of $0.50 or better in fiscal 1997, Hanifen said.
-- Its shares were off 1/4 at 11 on Monday afternoon.
